Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.core.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.core
    This package defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of JGrapes.
    org.jgrapes.core.annotation  
    org.jgrapes.core.events

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCompletedEvent<T extends Event<?>>
      A utility class for implementing completed events.
      Subclasses of Event in org.jgrapes.core.events 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCompletedEvent<T extends Event<?>>
      A utility class for implementing completed events.
      class  Attached
      Signals the addition of a component (or subtree) to the component tree.
      class  Detached
      Signals the removal of a component from the component tree.
      class  Error
      This event signals that an error occurred while processing an event.
      class  HandlingError
      This event signals that a throwable occurred while executing a handler.
      class  Start
      An event that signals the start of the application.
      class  Started
      The event that signals the completion of the Start event.
      class  Stop
      An event that causes an application to shut down.
